Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A text code denoting the role of the Federal agency in the Grants management process (e.g., Federal awarding agency, oversight agency, funding agency).
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Address Line 1 Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A first line of the street address of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Address Line 2 Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A second line of the street address of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency City Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A city of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency County Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting a county/parish of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency County Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of a county/parish of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency State Or Province Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting a state or foreign province portion of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency State Or Province Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of a state or foreign province portion of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Zip Postal Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A zip or postal code of the Agency's legal business address.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Country Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting a country where the Agency's business address is located, using the International Standard for country codes (ISO) 3166-1 Alpha-3 GENC Profile.
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values: Refer to (ISO) 3166-1 Alpha-3 GENC Profile;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Country Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of a country where the Agency's business address is located.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Identifier Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A 3-digit Common Governmentwide Accounting Classification (CGAC) code assigned to the Federal agency department or establishment by the Treasury. (It is used for the Federal "agency identifier" and the "allocation transfer agency identifier" components in the Treasury Account Fund Symbol (TAFS)/ Treasury Account Symbol (TAS)). (236, 187, augmented)
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values: Refer to listing of OMB Agency/Bureau and Treasury Codes;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Identifier Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of the Federal agency department that awarded, executed, or is otherwise responsible for the grant transaction. (236, 187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Sub Tier Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the sub-tier Federal agency that awarded, executed, or is otherwise responsible for the grant transaction. (187, augmented)
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Sub Tier Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of the sub-tier Federal agency that awarded, executed, or is otherwise responsible for the grant transaction. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Office Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the primary organization within the Federal agency that awarded, executed, or is otherwise responsible for the grant transaction. (187, augmented)
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Office Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of the primary organization within the Federal agency that awarded, executed, or is otherwise responsible for the grant transaction. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Shared Contact Method Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A group contact email address, postal address, phone number, etc. that multiple people access, so that someone will respond even if others are unexpectedly absent during critical periods. (134)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the role of a Federal agency representative or point of contact (POC).

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Prefix Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A prefix of the name of a person from the Federal agency.
Master Std Data Element List.Related Element Reference(s):
(191) Agency_contact: Middle Name (char_64);
 (195) Grantor Contact Information;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person First Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A first name of a person from the Federal agency.
Master Std Data Element List.Related Element Reference(s):
(191) Agency_contact: First Name (char_128);
 (195) Grantor Contact Information;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Middle Initial Or Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A middle initial or middle name of a person from the Federal agency.
Master Std Data Element List.Related Element Reference(s):
(191) Agency_contact: Middle Name (char_64);
 (195) Grantor Contact Information;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Last Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A last name of a person from the Federal agency.
Master Std Data Element List.Related Element Reference(s):
(191) Agency_contact: Last Name (char_128);
 (195) Grantor Contact Information;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Suffix Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A suffix of the name of a person from the Federal agency.
Master Std Data Element List.Related Element Reference(s):
(191) Agency_contact: Middle Name (char_64);
 (195) Grantor Contact Information;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Address Line 1 Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A first line of the street address for the physical office location of the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Address Line 2 Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A second line of the street address for the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person City Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A city of the address for the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person State Or Province Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting a state or foreign province of the address for the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person State Or Province Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of a state or foreign province of the address for the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Zip Postal Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A zip or postal code of the address for the Federal agency point of contact. (134, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Country Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting a country where the Federal agency point of contact address is located, using the International Standard for country codes (ISO) 3166-1 Alpha-3 GENC Profile. (187, augmented)
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values: Refer to (ISO) 3166-1 Alpha-3 GENC Profile;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Country Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name of a country where the Federal agency point of contact address is located. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Email Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: An email address for the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Phone Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the type, or primary usage, of a phone number for the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Person Phone Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A phone number for the Federal agency point of contact.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Statutory Authority Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the statutory or regulatory requirements applicable to the grant program.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Authorizing Legislation Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A citation or text referencing the authorizing legislation that enables the grant program to exist.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Agency Transaction Identifier
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: The identifier an agency provides for a transaction. (253)
Master Std Data Element List.Authoritative and Other Sources: (253) U.S. Department of the Treasury Fiscal Service Data Registry
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Financial Transaction Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: FFM Transaction Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code that identifies the type of FFM transaction.
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Financial Transaction Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Internal Revenue Service 1099 Indicator
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Determines if the entity is IRS Form 1099 eligible. The Form 1099 is used to report payments to independent contractors, rental property income, income from interest and dividends, sales proceeds, and other miscellaneous income.
Master Std Data Element List.Service Activity Reference(s): GRM.030.010 Grant Award Issuance
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Financial Transaction Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: FFM Source Document Line Identifier
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: The identifier of the line item in a source document (e.g., requisition, order, or invoice).
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Financial Transaction Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: FFM Transaction Line LOA Identifier
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A unique identifier for a line of accounting (LOA) that associates the LOA with an FFM transaction line.
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Financial Transaction Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Interest Event Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A name that represents the national interest for which the grant program is created.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Interest Event Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A descriptive name of the national interest for which the grant program is created.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Code of an agency grant program in the grant program and financing schedules of the annual budget of the United States Government. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Name of an agency grant program in the grant program and financing schedules of the annual budget of the United States Government. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Agency Fund Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code that provides an alternative to the Treasury Account Symbol (TAS) by mapping to the Fund Code to the TAS.
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Line of Accounting (LOA) Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: FFM Disaster Emergency Fund Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Distinguishes whether the budgetary resources, obligations incurred, unobligated and obligated balances, and outlays are classified as disaster, emergency, wildfire suppression or none of the three. (Per USSGL TFM Part 2, Section IV, Account Attribute Definition Report.) (187)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Project Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Name of an agency grant program (which may be referred to as agency activities or projects) in the grant program and financing schedules of the annual budget of the United States Government. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Project Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Code of an agency grant program project in the grant program and financing schedules of the annual budget of the United States Government. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Trading Partner Agency Identifier
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Represents the agency identifier of the other department, agency, or establishment of the U. S. government involved in transactions with the reporting entity. Required if the Fed/Non-Federal Indicator = F or G. (253)
Master Std Data Element List.Authoritative and Other Sources: (253) U.S. Department of the Treasury Fiscal Service Data Registry
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Financial Transaction Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Trading Partner Main Account Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Represents the treasury main account code of the other department, agency, or establishment of the U. S. Government involved in transactions with the reporting entity. Required if the Fed/Non-Federal Indicator = F. (253)
Master Std Data Element List.Authoritative and Other Sources: (253) U.S. Department of the Treasury Fiscal Service Data Registry
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Financial Transaction Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Cooperative Agreement Involvement Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the level of substantial involvement that the Federal agency expects to have with the recipient of the cooperative agreement. (134, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Cost Sharing Description Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the portion of project costs not paid by Federal funds (unless otherwise authorized by Federal statute) defined in the Grant Program or Notice of Funding Opportunity Announcement. It may be a certain percentage or amount, or may be in the form of contributions of specified items or activities (e.g., provision of equipment), or a statement regarding the requirement for cost sharing. (134, 190, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Cash Management Improvement Act Indicator
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: An indicator identifying whether the grant program is subject to the Cash Management Improvement Act (CMIA).

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Eligibility Other Criteria Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code enumerating the considerations or factors used to assess eligibility of an applicant or application for a specified funding opportunity. (compiled from 134)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Eligibility Other Criteria Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the considerations or factors that determine an applicant or application for an award eligible for the specified funding opportunity (e.g., criteria that have the effect of making an application or project ineligible for Federal awards, whether referred to as “responsiveness” criteria, “go-no go” criteria, “threshold” criteria, "disqualification factors", or in other ways). This section should also address any eligibility criteria for beneficiaries or for grant program participants other than Federal award recipients. (134, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM General Eligible Applicant Business Type Characteristics Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A collection of codes denoting the attributes further defining the legal entity type(s) that the Federal agency has deemed eligible to apply for a specified funding opportunity.
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values: See tab for 'Business Type Values';

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM General Eligible Applicant Business Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the legal entity type(s) that the Federal agency has deemed eligible to apply for a specified funding opportunity.
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values: See tab for 'Business Type Values';

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting if the goal or performance measure is being established or evaluated at the grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project level.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal ID
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A number or label used to identify a particular grant program or Federal award project goal and associate the goal with target dates, activities, and performance measures.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the direction and focus of a grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project that identifies the change the grant program or Federal award project should advance and/or achieve. Goals serve as the foundation for developing objectives. (263, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal Objective Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the effects or results the grant program or Federal award project can achieve towards advancing its goal(s). Objectives stem from established goals and are specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and timebound (263, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal Technical Approach Description Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the technical approach to the grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project and activities that are intended to be accomplished in order to achieve the goals.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal Activity ID
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A number or label used to track a grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project activity as it relates to goals and objectives. (203, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal Activity Description Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project activity and its alignment to goals, results and performance measures, expenditures, or other achievements. (compiled from 203)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal Activity Reporting Frequency Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the appropriate reporting term corresponding to the grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project activity.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Stage Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the stage in the lifecycle of the grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project information.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Goal Activity Stage Status Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting whether the grant program, grant program project, or Federal award project activity is planned or accomplished.
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values: Planned; Accomplished

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Instrument Characteristics Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A collection of codes specifying characteristics of the Federal award instrument, e.g., formula grant, fixed amount award, and block grant.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Instrument Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the type of Federal financial assistance provided by the Federal award, e.g., a grant or cooperative agreement. (187, augmented)
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values:
Cooperative Agreement;
 Grant;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Financial Assistance Listing Title Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A Federal financial assistance listing of the area of work under which the Federal award was funded in the Assistance Listing. (187, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Financial Assistance Listing Number
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A unique number assigned to identify a Federal financial assistance listing in the Assistance Listing. (compiled from 187)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure ID
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A number or label used to identify a particular performance measure and associate the measure with specific Federal awarding agency program goals, objectives, or program/priority areas. (202)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Name Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A short descriptive name used to identify the performance measure at the grant program or Federal award project level.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Description Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A narrative describing the performance measure against which grant program or Federal award project progress and activities can be measured. This can be quantitative or qualitative. For example, it can include counts, percentages, or levels. It could also describe an accomplishment, a product, a condition, a result, or a status. (202, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the type of performance measure (e.g., output, outcome) against which the grant program or Federal award project can be measured.
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values:
Output;
 Outcome

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Value
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A quantitative or qualitative measurement identified as the baseline, target, or resultant measurement for the grant program or Federal award project.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Reporting Frequency Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the appropriate reporting term corresponding to the performance measure for the grant program or Federal award project.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Reporting Level Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the level at which the performance measure is reported (e.g., school district, county) for the grant program or Federal award project.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Stage Status Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the status of the identified performance measure (i.e., baseline, target, result) for the grant program or Federal award project.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Source Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A text description of where the performance measure data is coming from for the grant program or Federal award project.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Collection Method Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A text description of how the performance measure data is collected for the grant program or Federal award project.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Performance Measure Missed Target Explanation Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: Information regarding a potential shortfall for the performance measure target value for the grant program or Federal award project. (202, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Formula Calculation Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the calculation(s)/algorithm(s) used to determine distribution of funding for formula grants as prescribed by law or administrative regulation. (190, augmented)
Master Std Data Element List.Service Activity Reference(s):
GRM.010.010 Grant Program Set-up and Maintenance;
 GRM.020.020 Grant Application Review and Selection
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Grant Program Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Funding Opportunity Indirect Cost Rate Reimbursement Policy Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A reference to the Federal or Federal agency-specific policy on indirect cost rate reimbursement applicable to the grant program, including any limitations or exclusions as to types or amount of cost items.
Master Std Data Element List.Service Activity Reference(s):
GRM.010.010 Grant Program Set-up and Maintenance;
 GRM.060.010 Grant Recipient Indirect Cost Rate Negotiation
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Notice of Funding Opportunity

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Funding Line Of Accounting Amount
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: An amount that is a portion of the Federal award funding associated with the Accounting Classification Structure (ACS) components provided for accounting purposes.
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Line of Accounting (LOA) Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Funding Amount
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A dollar amount associated with a grant program, grant program project, or Federal award.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Funding Amount Status Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the status of the funding amount associated with a grant program or grant program project (e.g., requested, budgeted) or Federal award (e.g., committed, obligated).
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Funding Amount Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the funding amount type (e.g., total, average, ceiling) associated with a grant program, grant program project, or Federal award.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Funding Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code specifying whether funding amounts of grant financial assistance apply to the grant program, grant program project, or Federal award level.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Total Expenditures Amount
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A dollar amount of total Federal awards expended in a single fiscal year by a Federal grant program.
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name:
Grant Program Information;
 Grant Program Financial Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Funding Basis Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting whether the funding allocation is discretionary or non-discretionary.
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values:
discretionary;
 non-discretionary;

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Spending Plan Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A plan for spending the budgeted grant program amount over a specified period of time.
Master Std Data Element List.Service Activity Reference(s): GRM.010.010 Grant Program Set-up and Maintenance
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name:
Grant Program Information;
 Grant Program Financial Information

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Date
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A key date, or important date, that is used in the Grants management process.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Date Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the type of key date, or important date, used in the Grants management process.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Time
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A key time, or important time, that is used in the Grants management process.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Program Problem Statement Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the nature and extent of the problem to be addressed by the grant program, including how the grant program may relate to Congressional intent in authorizing and appropriations language, the priorities of agency leadership, and/or the lessons learned from previous grant programs. (263, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Policy Requirement Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A citation or text indicating the public policy, national policy, or Federal statutory and agency-specific policy for the grant program or Federal award.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Request Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the type of request for action, additional information or approvals as they relate to the grant program, funding opportunity, application for a Federal award, Federal award, Federal award modification, or audit.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Request Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the request for additional information or approvals as they relate to the grant program, funding opportunity, application for a Federal award, Federal award, Federal award modification, or audit.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Response Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of the response to a request for additional information or approvals throughout the grants management lifecycle.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Response Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the type of response to a request for additional information or approvals throughout the grants management lifecycle.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Terms And Conditions Level Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code identifying whether an individual term or condition is general (i.e., agency standard) or specific (i.e., award specific) for the Federal award.
Master Std Data Element List.Domain Values:
General;
 Specific

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Terms And Conditions Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code identifying the category of an individual term or condition applicable to the Federal award.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Terms And Conditions ID
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A unique identifier associated with an individual term or condition.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Terms And Conditions Description Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: The text of an individual term or condition stating the nature of the requirement, and, if applicable, the reason why the requirement is being imposed, the nature of the action(s) needed to remove the additional requirement, the time allowed for completing the action(s), and the method for requesting reconsideration of the requirement imposed. (24, augmented)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Description Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A plain language description of the Federal award purpose; activities to be performed; deliverables and expected outcomes; intended beneficiary(ies); and subrecipient activities if known/specified at the time of award.
Master Std Data Element List.Data Group Name: Award Agreement
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Legal Entity Organization Name
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: The name of the organization associated with the entity identifier.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Legal Entity Role Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the role of the legal entity such as a Federal award applicant or Federal award recipient (221) that relates to the legal entity unique identifier.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Legal Entity Unique ID
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A Unique Entity Identifier number for a legal entity (221) involved in the grants management process assigned during the entity validation process. (27, 187, augmented)
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Program Project Plan Person Role Quantity
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the role of the legally responsible person associated with the legal entity.

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: GRM Legal Entity Address Type Code
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A code denoting the address type of the legal entity involved in the grant management activity as a place of performance, headquarters, etc.
Master Std Data Element List.Business Information Exchange (BIE):
Federal Financial Management (FFM) Transaction;
 USAspending Financial Assistance Broker Submission (FABS)

Master Std Data Element List.Data Element Name: Grant Award Primary Place Of Performance Location Description Text
Master Std Data Element List.Definition: A description of where the predominant performance of the Federal award will be accomplished. (187, augmented)

 GRM.060.010 Grant Recipient Indirect Cost Rate Negotiation

The distribution base must exclude participant support costs. (137)

Project;

Federal Award Application Package;
